products.title: Vapour Perfect Fit
products.description: This vapour perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Aria Vapour
products.description: Min width: 330mm max width: 1400mm min drop: 165mm max drop: 1800mm fabric composition: polyester guarantee: 12 months controls: tensioned system, move bottom bar to raise/lower blind.
